document.full_text: states are projecting slightly higher revenue collections in fiscal 2012, but the slow pace of the economic recovery is leaving many with deficits and mounting spending pressure for health care and education, according to a fiscal survey released on thursday.
document.title: states' rising bills may outpace revenue: survey
lines_and_colors: states are projecting slightly higher revenue collections in fiscal 2012, but the slow pace of the economic recovery is leaving many with deficits and mounting spending pressure for health care and education, according to a fiscal survey released on thursday.
